splash.splashContent:
Welcome to rePurpose!


With this app, you can explore the community resources available to Hamilton residents, view recommendations for additional resources made by other residents, and even suggest some of your own!


All tools are located in the top-right corner.

  • To view the legend, click on the Legend widget.

  • To toggle layers on and off, click on the Layers widget.

  • To get a better understanding of what is available in your neighbourhood, use the Near Me widget to input your address.

  • To see what community enhancements other residents have recommended, click on the Community Input widget to view the breakdown. Results are filtered by screen extent, so the further you zoom out, the more results you will be able to see in the breakdown.

  • To share a link to this app, click on Share the App.

  • Finally, to suggest community enhancements yourself, click on Take the rePurpose Survey! This will launch a GeoForm for you to fill out. Once completed, you can re-open this app to see your recommendation!


To see all of this information again, click on About the App.

config.editorDescription: Search for an address or locate on map

config.text: Number of responses by suggested community enhancement
